```{r, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
rmd <- list.files(pattern = '*.Rmd', recursive = F, include.dirs = F)
sel = substr(rmd, 1, 2) %in% c('t2')
chunks <- paste0("```{r child = '", rmd[sel], "'}\n```\n\n--------------------\n")
cat(chunks, sep = '\n')
```
